title: We need more bans ... 10 bans is not enought. Also would be nice to see enemy ban
body:
So we would avoid to waste ban on the same target. I want to be able to ban every single bullshit champs.

There is too many rampants OP champions for the numbers of ban we have. If we left some free, they get picked. Yasuo and AP Malphite are must ban in low elo because if you don't they get instantly picked…

Seeing enemy bans should be already a thing. How many time it happen that we waste ban on the same champions… so the 10 bans often end in 9 or less.. it feel aweful.
